title: 突發 太空又send email回應最近一連串嘅社會運動

replies.msg:
Dear HKU SPACE CC students,

The teachers and management of HKUSPACE Community College are still very concerned with the well-being of our students participating in the current movements in Hong Kong. The mass rallies that began in mid-June have now transpired into multiple, smaller-scale demonstrations held at discrete locations. It is unlikely that the issues leading to the protests can be resolved in the near future. I am personally in favor of the idea for Hong Kong to establish a cross-sector platform to discuss the means of diffusing the current tension, as already proposed by several university presidents. Such a platform can enable Government and our society leaders to understand better the root cause for the discontent and despair of the students and young people of Hong Kong.

At this time, I have three particular concerns. The first one is the safety of our students. I would like to appeal to those of you participating in any rally or demonstration to be non-violent and non-confrontational in the actions you are taking, and be vigilant of your own safety at all times.

Secondly, I am concerned about the psychological well-being of our students. I know some students, who may or may not have participated in the rallies, are experiencing emotional distress. The College's counselors are prepared to offer advisory service to any CC student in need. All information and dialogue with our counselors will be treated with strict confidentiality.

A third concern is the family relation of our students. I have learned about several cases in which contrasting opinions between parents and the children have led to family feud and confrontation. I appeal to both parents and students to try to understand and appreciate each other's stance -- the children's is to try to take control of their own future and destiny, and the parents' is to protect and for the love of their children. I pray that the integrity of no family be disrupted by any divided political opinions that may exist among family members.

With my sincere regards,

Prof Chan Lung Sang
College Principal

* * *
Prof L.S. Chan
Deputy Director and College Principal
HKUSPACE Community College
The University of Hong Kong


tldr:太空反送中 對話算重要 不過我地最主要都係希望同學生理 心理嘅安全 以及 同家人嘅關係 有咩事可以番學校搵counselors 然後一句譴責暴力嘅說話都無

太空>紅底HKCC
